title: Coaching Culture Design and Implementation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level understanding of organizational development (OD) core concepts and coaching principles
context.additional_context: Professionals in medical/legal/technical fields who require enhanced capabilities in designing coaching cultures using scientific problem-solving approaches

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three leadership motivation strategies to implement a coaching culture within an organization.
Learners can develop case-specific action plans using practical frameworks for building coaching relationships.
Learners can design and evaluate coaching culture diffusion scenarios applying role modeling techniques.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
